#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define M 1000000007
ll dp[202][102][105][3];
ll ans(int rb,int fb,int r,int flag){
 ll xx=0;
 if(r>=100)
  return 1;
 else if(rb<=0)
  return 0;
 else if(dp[rb][fb][r][flag]!=-1)
  return dp[rb][fb][r][flag];
 else
   {
       xx+=ans(rb-1,fb,r+1,0);
       xx+=ans(rb-1,fb,r+2,0);
       //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb-1,fb,r+4,0);
       //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb-1,fb,r+6,0);
       //xx%=M;
       if(flag<2)
       xx+=ans(rb-1,fb,r,flag+1);
       //xx%=M;
     if(fb>0){
       xx+=ans(rb,fb-1,r+1,flag);
        //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb,fb-1,r+2,flag);
       //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb,fb-1,r+4,flag);
        //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb,fb-1,r+6,flag);
        //xx%=M;
       xx+=ans(rb,fb-1,r,flag);
        //xx%=M;
      }
     return dp[rb][fb][r][flag]=xx%M;
   }
 }
 int main(){
  int rb,nb;int t;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
  while(t--){
  scanf("%d%d",&rb,&nb);
  ll yy;
  yy=ans(rb,nb,0,0);
  printf("%lld\n",yy);
  }
  return 0;
 }
